RootPath.name: Audio Root Folder
RootPath.hint: Folder inside Data to scan (default: assets/audio).

SyncMenu.name: Synchronize Playlists
SyncMenu.label: Open
SyncMenu.hint: Create/update playlists by folder structure in Data/assets/audio.

PLAYLISTSYNC.ErrorBrowseFailed: Playlist Sync: unable to scan folder (see console).
PLAYLISTSYNC.WarnGMOnly: Synchronization is available only to GM.
PLAYLISTSYNC.InfoScanComplete: Playlist Sync: completed in {time}s. Playlists: {playlists}. Sounds: +{created} / updated {updated} / deleted {deleted}.
PLAYLISTSYNC.MenuDescription: Synchronization creates (or updates) playlists by folder structure inside Data/{rootPath}. Playlists are grouped as:
PLAYLISTSYNC.MenuNote2: Important: requires GM access. By default, sounds are updated in place (UUIDs and references are preserved). Recreate mode intentionally breaks references.
PLAYLISTSYNC.SoundSyncHint: Configure how the module updates PlaylistSound documents. In-place updates preserve UUIDs (and any references).

SoundSyncStrategy.name: Sound sync strategy
SoundSyncStrategy.hint: Merge keeps UUIDs and references. Recreate deletes and creates again (references break).
SoundSyncStrategy.label: Strategy

SoundMatchMode.name: Sound matching
SoundMatchMode.hint: How to match a filesystem file to an existing PlaylistSound while merging.
SoundMatchMode.label: Match by

OrphanPolicy.name: Orphan sounds
OrphanPolicy.hint: What to do with sounds that exist in a playlist but are not present in the filesystem plan.
OrphanPolicy.label: Unmatched sounds

UpdateSoundParams.name: Update sound parameters
UpdateSoundParams.hint: When a match is found, update repeat/volume/channel/fade (merge mode).
UpdateSoundParams.label: Parameters (volume/repeat/channel/fade)

UpdateSoundPath.name: Update file path
UpdateSoundPath.hint: When a match is found, update path if the file moved.
UpdateSoundPath.label: Path (path)

UpdateSoundName.name: Update sound name
UpdateSoundName.hint: When a match is found, update name (useful for tags in flattened mode).
UpdateSoundName.label: Name (name)

UpdateSoundSort.name: Update sorting
UpdateSoundSort.hint: When a match is found, update sort so track order matches the file list.
UpdateSoundSort.label: Order (sort)

MarkManagedSounds.name: Mark sounds as managed
MarkManagedSounds.hint: Set module flags on created/updated sounds. Required for safe 'delete managed only'.
MarkManagedSounds.label: Mark as managed (flags)

PreferManagedMatch.name: Prefer matching by metadata
PreferManagedMatch.hint: First try matching sounds by the module flag (sourcePath). Makes sync idempotent even if a sound name changed (manually or via FVTT auto-rename).
PreferManagedMatch.label: Match by sourcePath first

Presets.name: Presets
Presets.hint: Presets allow customizing volume, repeat, channel, fade settings, and playback mode for playlists based on their path patterns.

PLAYLISTSYNC.PresetsHint: Presets are applied by first regex match against the playlist path: <rootPath>/<category>/<subdirs>.
PLAYLISTSYNC.PresetsEmpty: No presets yet. Everything as usual.

FlattenPaths.name: Flatten subfolders into tags
FlattenPaths.hint: Create one playlist per top-level folder (category). Sounds from subfolders are added into the root playlist and their names are prefixed with tags like [horror] home. Presets match <rootPath>/<category>.
